definitions.definition: give or bequeath an income or property to (a person or institution).
examples: he endowed the church with lands

definitions.definition: establish (a college post, annual prize, or project) by donating the funds needed to maintain it.
examples: finance, fund, pay for, provide for, subsidize, support financially, put up the money for; Moreestablish, found, set up, institute "the CEO endowed a hospital for sick kids"Moreestablish, found, set up, institute the CEO endowed a hospital for sick kids

definitions.definition: provide with a quality, ability, or asset.
examples: he was endowed with tremendous physical strength
synonyms: bestow; literaryendue "nature endowed fish with gills"
